page.title: 12PLUCKLEY GHOSTS 1
page.content: There are reputedly 12 traditional ghosts belonging to Pluckley and dozens more unofficial ghosts. There are many books written about the ghosts of Pluckley but very little evidence of their existence before the turn of the century. {THE RED LADY}is a sorrowing ghost because her baby died as soon as it was born and that is why she walks through the graveyard looking for an unmarked grave with her baby in it. {THE COLONEL}hung himself from a branch of a tree in Park Wood, which since that time has been home for his restless spirit. It is thought that he, like many of the Pluckley ghosts, was a member of the Dering family.
